Title: Imposes a tax on health maintenance organizations and establishes the medical malpractice relief fund
Summary: Imposes a tax on health maintenance organizations and establishes the medical malpractice relief fund.
LawCode: Add Art 33-C §§1580 - 1582, Tax L; add §97-ssss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to imposing a tax on health maintenance organizations and creating the medical malpractice relief fund
